import React from "react"; import data from "../data/chapter.json"; import { Accordion } from "react-bootstrap"; import {IoIosArrowDown} from 'react-icons/io'; const Chapter = ({isBg}) => { const {chapter} = data; return(
{chapter.subtitle}

{chapter.title}

{chapter.chapterItem?.map((data) => ( {data.title}

{data.description}

 ))}
) } export default Chapter;
